<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get notification policy tree</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/provisioning/policies"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get notification policy tree. <br /> 
*Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.*
